summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2733 for the improvement of Second Avenue and Second Avenue South, from Pike Street to King Street, all in the City of Seattle, by repaving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper foundation, by providing for the proper sewerage and water service, under Ordinance No. 32286, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
